title: Unique opportunity to live townhome
posting_body: Unique opportunity to live in the burgeoning Meadowbrook neighborhood which straddles the border of Buckhead and Sandy Springs and is also moments from Chastain Park!
1 spacious bedrooms with an oversized Living room, separate dining room and a chef's kitchen.
Parking directly in front provides easy access and convenience that we all want.

Updated appliances, newer light fixtures, fresh paint and a fenced in back patio are some of the perks included with this sophisticated townhome, that's within walking distance of numerous restaurants, shopping and Chastain Park.
Entertaining is a breeze in the open-concept living room, which allows for easy access to the dining and kitchen areas.
Privacy abounds in the bedrooms upstairs with plantation shutters, Elfa closets and well-insulated walls.
An updated HVAC system provides superb heating and cooling for each floor.
New roofs ensure that there are no leaks to contend with in the community.
Newer water heater provides a constant flow of hot water to all bathrooms.
Easy access to GA400, the Buckhead Financial District and I-285.
Numerous restaurants nearby include Supercar, Snooze, Baraco, Hal's Steakhouse and many more within walking distance!
